title: Shed Tears for the River
creator_credit: Nicholas Alexander, David Corke and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Deals with the many environmental crises of the River Murray, past and present. The problems are emphasised by travelling along the river and talking to the people who are dependant upon it for water, irrigation, food and recreation. Script, David Corke; photography, Nicholas Alexander.
